Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc03
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc03.model.card.cardObjective

Class CardObjective

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc03.model.card.Card
it.polimi.ingsw.gc03.model.card.cardObjective.CardObjective
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class CardObjective extends Card implements Serializable
This class represents a Objective card.

  • Field Details

    • objective

      private String objective
      Textual description of the card's objective.

    • point

      private int point
      Card points.

    • parameters

      private ArrayList<Value> parameters
      Parameters used to calculate the points. In the case of Objective cards that use diagonal, the values in the array must be written in order from left to right of the card. In the case of Objective cards that use the pile, the values in the array must be written starting from the card in the codex that gives rise to the pile.

    • scoreStrategy

      private CalculateScoreStrategy scoreStrategy
      Strategy to apply for calculating the points given by the objective.

    • image

      private String image
      Image of the card.

  • Constructor Details

    • CardObjective

      public CardObjective(String idCard, String objective, int point, ArrayList<Value> parameters, CalculateScoreStrategy scoreStrategy)
      Constructor for the CardObjective class.
      Parameters:
      idCard - The unique identifier of the card.
      objective - Textual description of the card's objective.
      point - The points of the card.
      parameters - The parameters used to calculate the points.
      scoreStrategy - Strategy to apply for calculating the points given by the objective.

      point - The points of the card.
      parameters - Parameters used to calculate the points.
      Returns:
